department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Bowl, bronze, with strongly rounded sides curved in to upper rim, no base rim. Decorated around top by row of inscription over scroll pattern background. There is said to be little change in style of Mohammedan metal work even to the present day. (Bronze disease)
dimension: 3 3/4 x 5 3/4 x 5 3/4 in. (9.5 x 14.61 x 14.61 cm) (diameter at top)
title: Bowl
